subject: Re: [junit] New poll for junit
msgSnippet: And we have a corporate standard of 1.4.1 at this time. I haven t even begun to think about using 1.5 yet. Who knows when corporate will decide we can update
messageBody:
And we have a corporate standard of 1.4.1 at this time. I haven't even
begun to think about using 1.5 yet. Who knows when corporate will
decide we can update and I think that the Mac (my primary personal
platform) is still using 1.4.2, even under OS X 10.4. Which is a big
reason why I haven't upgraded past OS X 10.3 yet. :-(

Simon

On 1/19/06, Mark Levison <mlevison@...> wrote:
> Like Kevin the answer is more complex than radio buttons. Our client
> development work is 1.4; our server side work is 1.3 and will like only take
> another 6-12 mths to change.
>
> Mark
